issue.title: tcdn.com.br
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://tcdn.com.br](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Ftcdn.com.br) ### Comment > `newsletter-popup.js$to=tcdn.com.br` > `newsletter-popup.css$to=tcdn.com.br` > > This domain belongs to an e-commerce system. `newsletter-popup.js` and `newsletter-popup.css` display overlays when you scroll up and down. > > Example pages: > > `https://www.lumiina.com.br/` > > `https://www.vulcanoout.com.br/` > > `https://www.pwstore.com.br/ > > `https://www.vitrola.com.br/` > > More examples at https://urlscan.io/search/#filename%3A%22newsletter-popup.js%22%20domain%3Abr%20%20 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/l5tiqywayds880kc888csoowwswgocgc9fyc9ngbzc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/46bevi9v06skcg0os8ck0kwwcs48gksbke6lsmzda0.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://rezka.ag/series/documentary/35236-posledniy-agent-ubn-2020.html#t:232-s:1-e:1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frezka.ag%2Fseries%2Fdocumentary%2F35236-posledniy-agent-ubn-2020.html%23t%3A232-s%3A1-e%3A1) ### Comment > При включенном адгуард не запускается видео и сайт пишет что есть проблемы с интернетом. > > Зайти на сайт > Нажать кнопку play > Видео не запускается ### Screenshots

issue.body:
